title: DRC for the TDR will be issued by the Commissioner, MCGM himself on recommendation by CEO (SRA)
clause_text: DRC for the TDR will be issued by the Commissioner, MCGM himself on recommendation by CEO (SRA). DRC shall state the DRs credit of BUA in square meters in figures and in words along with the details of place i.e. village/TP Scheme/Division, CS No/CTS No/FP No from where it is generated, year of issue of DRC and Ward in which the DRs are earned.
section: Additional Regulations for the grant of TDR to the Developers/Co- operative Housing Societies/NGOs in respect of slum rehabilitation scheme vide DCR 33(10) and DCR 33(11)
